title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 401.5 - Chiropractic fee schedule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 401.5 - Chiropractic fee schedule

State Regulations

The fee schedule for chiropractic treatment and care
rendered under the Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law shall be the schedule of
fees for chiropractic treatment and care under the Workers' Compensation Law of
the State of New York, as set forth in sections
348.1
and
348.2
of this Title, on the date
on which the chiropractic services were rendered, regardless of the date of
accident. This chiropractic fee schedule is applicable in accordance with the
provisions of section
348.1
of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
401.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
